name: Zirco Mobile
description:
Zirco Mobile is a mobile solutions company providing mobile development services on the platforms of iOS, Android and Windows. We develop mobile apps, mobile games and offer consulting services to clients to help achieve their strategic business objectives. Our unique design methodology, competitive pricing and high end app development gives us the competitive edge over other companies in the mobile industry.
We are led by a team of professionals who have consolidated experience in the mobile industry. Our team comprises of highly experienced Project Managers, Designers, Developers, Artists & Testers.
